Pre-Game Insights: The 3rd ODI of West Indies tour of Sri Lanka 2024 will be played on Saturday, 26 October 2024, at Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy.

The West Indies Predicted XI includes Brandon King, Alick Athanaze, Shai Hope (WK/C), Keacy Carty, Roston Chase, Sherfane Rutherford, Romario Shepherd, Gudakesh Motie, Hayden Walsh, Jayden Seales, Alzarri Joseph.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch is expected to be batting-friendly with an average 1st innings score of 280.
The best suited conditions for the match are pace & spin.
Others: The match will be broadcast on Sony Network and live streamed on Sony LIV.
